work.summary: Joined as Senior Software Engineer. Focused on refactoring the monolith into service based architecture. Changed the direction to DevOps role and DevOps team lead.
highlights: Work on AWS infrastructure: EC2, ECS, IAM, S3, KMS, CloudWatch, Lambda, RDS, Dynamo, VPC, Route53 etc.
Managed production infrastructure with terraform (IAC). Code changes were driven entirely by git workflow. Terraform plans were posted as PR comments, merges caused applies.
Refactor codebase to run with Docker and orchestrate it with ECS
Implemented internal tools for managing configuration and releases. (https://github.com/fieldaware/confgen)
Recreated from scratch the CI and CD pipeline with Docker (CircleCI, Shippable), resulting with reproducible builds executable from any environment.
Added features and fixes to the existing system (Python) ~ 50K SLOC
Improved production runtime of python services with uWSGI. Plugins, worker lifecycle management, serving static assets etc.
Maintained and develop infrastructure with puppet and foreman (100+ EC2 instances)
Built deployment and infra management tools with ansible
Monitoring improvements (dashboards, metrics) - DataDog, logentries, CloudWatch

work.summary: Developed complex, big scale content system (similar to Dropbox). Working with multinational agile team based in Helsinki, mostly remotely from Poland.
highlights: Implemented various features in Python and PL/SQL
Refactored tests responsible for finding flaws in high availability setup
Stabilized the code base to make it more predictable build wise

work.summary: Design and develop a DSP (demend site platform) for RTB environment. 5K+ RPS on t2.medium
highlights: Implemented core backend server with Python (Twisted, asyncio) and Redis
Introduced TDD approach to the team (pytest, unit and integration)
Modeled the reporting system based on RabbitMQ and MongoDB

work.summary: Joined small team of developers to build advertising platform. At its peak system served 300 RPS on average, which was half of the Polish web at the time.
highlights: Implemented new features for system frontend with Python/HTML/JavaScript
Improved and bug fixed core system with Python and PL/SQL
